type="java_code"><field name="CODE">// Calculate center position&#10;BlockPos centerPos = BlockPos.containing(&#10;    entity.getX() + entity.getPersistentData().getDouble("SonicClapRepeat") * = 6;&#10;RandomSource random = RandomSource.create(); // Create a random instance&#10;for (int x = -radius; x <= radius; x++) {&#10;    for (int y = -radius; y <= radius; y++) {&#10;        for (int z = -radius; z <= radius; z++) {&#10;            // Only process blocks within spherical radius&#10;            if (x*x + y*y + z*z <= radius*radius) {&#10;                BlockPos checkPos = centerPos.offset(x, y, z);&#10;                BlockState blockState = world.getBlockState(checkPos);&#10;                Block block = blockState.getBlock();&#10;&#10;                // Destroy leaves and glass (replace with air)&#10;                if (block instanceof LeavesBlock || block instanceof AbstractGlassBlock) {&#10;                    // Play breaking sound&#10;                    if (world instanceof Level _level) {&#10;                        if (!_level.isClientSide()) {&#10;                            _level.playSound(null, checkPos,&#10;                                blockState.getSoundType().getBreakSound(),&#10;                                SoundSource.BLOCKS, &#10;                                1.0F, &#10;                                0.8F + random.nextFloat() * 0.4F); // Use local random&#10;                        }&#10;                    }&#10;                    &#10;                    // Show breaking particles&#10;                    if (world instanceof ServerLevel _level) {&#10;                        _level.sendParticles(new BlockParticleOption(ParticleTypes.BLOCK, blockState),&#10;                            checkPos.getX() + 0.5,&#10;                            checkPos.getY() + 0.5,&#10;                            checkPos.getZ() + 0.5,&#10;                            10,&#10;                            0.5, 0.5, 0.5,&#10;                            0.05);&#10;                    }&#10;                    &#10;                    world.setBlock(checkPos, Blocks.AIR.defaultBlockState(), 3);&#10;                } &#10;                // Replace grass blocks with dirt&#10;                else if (block == Blocks.GRASS_BLOCK || block == Blocks.DIRT_PATH || &#10;                         block == Blocks.MYCELIUM || block == Blocks.PODZOL) {&#10;                    // Play digging sound&#10;                    if (world instanceof Level _level) {&#10;                        if (!_level.isClientSide()) {&#10;                            _level.playSound(null, checkPos,&#10;                                SoundEvents.GRASS_BREAK,&#10;                                SoundSource.BLOCKS, &#10;                                0.7F, &#10;                                0.8F + random.nextFloat() * 0.4F); // Use local random&#10;                        }&#10;                    }&#10;                    &#10;                    BlockState _bs = Blocks.DIRT.defaultBlockState();&#10;                    // Preserve block properties&#10;                    BlockState _bso = world.getBlockState(checkPos);&#10;                    for (Map.Entry<Property<?>, Comparable<?>> entry : _bso.getValues().entrySet()) {&#10;                        Property _property = _bs.getBlock().getStateDefinition().getProperty(entry.getKey().getName());&#10;                        if (_property != null && _bs.getValue(_property) != null) {&#10;                            try {&#10;                                _bs = _bs.setValue(_property, (Comparable) entry.getValue());&#10;                            } catch (Exception e) {&#10;                                // Silent catch&#10;                            }&#10;                        }&#10;                    }&#10;                    world.setBlock(checkPos, _bs, 3);&#10;                }&#10;            }&#10;        }&#10;
